Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to rental assistance for low income elderly families
Summary: Relates to rental assistance for low income elderly families; imposes a tax on conveyances or transfers of residential real property whose consideration is greater than two million dollars.
LawCode: Amd §654-b, add Art 16-B §§930 - 933, Priv Hous Fin L; amd §§11-2102 & 11-2104, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the provision of rental assistance for low income elderly families, and to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to imposing a tax on conveyances or transfers of residential real property whose consideration is greater than two million dollars
